direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods query portfolio margin-related data but for different aspects (asset index price vs. collateral rate).
Both methods access portfolio margin-related data with similar parameter handling.
Both methods involve querying account-related data, which can affect the state of the portfolio margin account.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the RequestHandler is required before any API request can be made, including assetIndexPrice.

enhanced_by.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: This method is invoked internally by assetIndexPrice to send the API request, making it crucial for the test setup.
A method to verify the response format and content can be used to assert the correctness of the assetIndexPrice response.
